trans-unit.source: What do I need to get started with Azure Data Catalog?
trans-unit.target: What do I need to get started with Azure Data Catalog?

trans-unit.source: What do I need to get started with Azure Data Catalog?
trans-unit.target: What do I need to get started with Azure Data Catalog?

trans-unit.source: There are a few things you’ll need to take care of before you can set up **Azure Data Catalog**.
trans-unit.target: There are a few things you’ll need to take care of before you can set up **Azure Data Catalog**.

trans-unit.source: Don’t worry – they won’t take long!
trans-unit.target: Don’t worry – they won’t take long!

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) provides an easy way for your business to manage identity and access, both in the cloud and on-premises.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) provides an easy way for your business to manage identity and access, both in the cloud and on-premises.

trans-unit.source: Users can use a single work or school account for single sign-on to any cloud and on-premises web application.
trans-unit.target: Users can use a single work or school account for single sign-on to any cloud and on-premises web application.

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Catalog uses Azure AD to authenticate sign-on.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Catalog uses Azure AD to authenticate sign-on.

trans-unit.source: To learn more, see [How to get started using Azure AD](active-directory-get-started.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn more, see [How to get started using Azure AD](active-directory-get-started.md).

trans-unit.source: Azure subscriptions help you organize access to cloud service resources like Azure Data Catalog.
trans-unit.target: Azure subscriptions help you organize access to cloud service resources like Azure Data Catalog.

trans-unit.source: They also help you control how resource usage is reported, billed, and paid for.
trans-unit.target: They also help you control how resource usage is reported, billed, and paid for.

trans-unit.source: Each subscription can have a different billing and payment setup, so you can have different subscriptions and different plans by department, project, regional office, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Each subscription can have a different billing and payment setup, so you can have different subscriptions and different plans by department, project, regional office, and so on.

trans-unit.source: Every cloud service belongs to a subscription, and you need to have a subscription before setting up Azure Data Catalog.
trans-unit.target: Every cloud service belongs to a subscription, and you need to have a subscription before setting up Azure Data Catalog.

trans-unit.source: To learn more, see [Manage Accounts, Subscriptions, and Administrative Roles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh531793.aspx).
trans-unit.target: To learn more, see [Manage Accounts, Subscriptions, and Administrative Roles](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh531793.aspx).
